## Training - Data

### Load data

```{r}

  data_read("data/germeval2018.training.txt",
         header = FALSE)

head(d_train)
```
### Renaming Columns

```{r}
names(d_train) <- c("text", "c1", "c2")
```

### Adding an ID Column

